entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
